pkgmetadata.longdescription: # IntroductionThis module provides middleware to publish [NetBox](https://github.com/digitalocean/netbox/) changes to [Kafka](https://kafka.apache.org/).# Installation`pip install netbox-kafka-producer`# ConfigurationAdd the following to your NetBox settings.```INSTALLED_APPS += ('netbox_kafka_producer',)MIDDLEWARE += ('netbox_kafka_producer.middleware.KafkaChangeMiddleware',)KAFKA = {'SERVERS': 'kafka01,kafka02,kafka03','TOPIC': 'netbox',}```
